title: Sketchbook Folio, "Night Landscape with Stream and Moon in Cloudy Sky", 1890–1900
medium: Pen and black ink on paper
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: View down a dark country road. In distance road curves left at shadowy stand of trees. More trees in lefy and right stances. very dark sky. Miscellaneous pen marks in margin at top left of sheet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Night Landscape with Stream and Moon in Cloudy Sky", 1890–1900.
1890–1900. Pen and black ink on paper. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-89-12.
